page.title: 14LIfestyle of a Bervie Boy
page.content: In the morning I usually get up at about 8.00am. I get dressed and then have my breakfast. After that I pack my school-bag and get ready for school arriving there at 8.45am and play football until school starts. We work until 10.30am then it is our play-time. The games we play are football or sometimes "kick-the-can". We go back to work at 10.45am and the next break is not until 12.15am. It is time for dinner and I have a packed-lunch. At 1.15pm it is back to work until home time at 3.15pm. I go home, do my homework and watch T.V. until it is time for tea. Later I go out to play football or "kerby" with Neil. I go home at about 8.30pm and have something to eat. I watch T.V. until I go to bed at about 10.00pm.
